column5: Well last month I had the opportunity to fish some new water and for a new species. I have never really targeted for carp before but this was a good chance for me to give it a go. Now bring on the chrome and Quinte gold!
Carp are the fish of the future!!!
It's slowly gaining momentum... very slowly. haha
Cool video...  I know exactly where you were.... Lol  I've fished there before....
You guys should come to the st lawrence in late May/early June.... Carp fishing is crazy....
I'm not interested in carp fishing, but I had to reply, that video was incredible!
I love fishing these gold monsters! Good work man.
Wow kevin  The video and editing was great.  Thanks for the effort.  Very fun to watch.  Cheers  Craig
Always appreciate the time and effort you put into making these videos Kevin!!  Great job on another one!    :good:  :clapping:

Wow.  I dunno what to say except that video was exceptionally good!  Great music, effects, camera angles above and below the water.  Just amazing.  You guys really captured the excitement of carping, especially the screaming bite alarm and bouncing rod tip( Crack for carp fishermen ..lol ).  Thank you.  Very enjoyable.
Thank you all for the kind words.  I just picked up on this video editing stuff and although it's taking up a lot of my spare time, it's very fun and rewarding to see the final result.
